dcterms:description: The LiTS dataset consists of 201 CT images with liver and liver tumors annotations, including a range of cancer types such as hepatocellular carcinoma and metastasis from colorectal, breast, and lung cancer. It is designed to closely represent real-world clinical data.
dcterms:title: LiTS

dcterms:description: The mCRC dataset contains 198 CT scans of patients who underwent hepatic resection for colorectal liver metastasis, with tumor counts ranging from 1 to 17. It is used to evaluate noninvasive prognostic markers of hepatic recurrence.
dcterms:title: mCRC
